clear_sheet.description: Clears all rows on an existing sheet.

props.name: headerRow
props.description: Enter the row number where your column headers are located (usually row 1).

copy-worksheet.description: Creates a new worksheet by copying an existing one.

create-column.description: Creates a new column in a specific spreadsheet.

props.name: columnIndex
props.description: The column index starts from 1.For example, if you want to add a column to the third column, enter 3.Ff the input is less than 1 the column will be added after the last current column.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the new spreadsheet.

props.name: folder
props.description: The folder to create the worksheet in.By default, the new worksheet is created in the root folder of drive.

create-worksheet.description: Create a new blank worksheet with a title.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the new worksheet.

delete_row.description: Delete a specific row from the selected sheet.

props.name: rowId
props.description: The number of the row you want to delete.

export_sheet.description: Download a worksheet as a CSV or TSV file.

props.name: format
props.description: Select the file type to export the sheet as.

props.name: returnAsText
props.description: Return the exported data as text instead of a file.

find_row_by_num.description: Retrieve a specific row using its unique ID.

props.name: rowNumber
props.description: Enter the row number you want to retrieve

props.name: headerRow
props.description: Enter the row number where your column headers are located (usually row 1).

find_rows.description: Look up rows in a worksheet based on a column value.

props.name: searchValue
props.description: The value to look for in the selected column. Leave empty to return all rows.

props.name: matchCase
props.description: Only return rows where the cell value exactly matches the search value.

props.name: startingRow
props.description: Start searching from this row number.

props.name: numberOfRows
props.description: How many rows to return. Defaults to 1 if not specified.

props.name: headerRow
props.description: The row number that contains the column names.

props.name: useHeaderNames
props.description: Use column names as keys instead of A, B, C.

props.name: spreadsheet_name
props.description: Enter the name of the spreadsheet to search for

props.name: exact_match
props.description: If true, only return spreadsheets that exactly match the name. If false, return spreadsheets that contain the name.

props.name: exact_match
props.description: If true, only return worksheets that exactly match the name. If false, return worksheets that contain the name.

format-row.description: Format one or multiple rows in specific spreadsheet.

props.name: startingRow
props.description: The first row number where formatting should begin.

props.name: endingRow
props.description: The last row number where formatting should stop (leave empty to format only the starting row).

props.name: bgColor
props.description: Provide a HEX color code (example: #FFD966)

props.name: textColor
props.description: Provide a HEX color code (example: #FFD966)

get-many-rows.description: Get all the rows from a specific sheet.

get_next_rows.description: Get next group of rows from a specifiec workheet

props.name: startRow
props.description: Which row to start from?

props.name: headerRow
props.description: Which row contains the headers?

props.name: useHeaderNames
props.description: Map A/B/Câ€¦ to the actual column headers (row specified above).

props.name: memKey
props.description: The key used to store the current row number in memory

props.name: groupSize
props.description: The number of rows to get

google-sheets-insert-multiple-rows.description: Add multiple rows of data at once to a specific spreadsheet.

props.name: input_type
props.description: Select the format of the input values to be added into the worksheet.

props.name: values
props.description: The values to add.

props.name: overwrite
props.description: Enable this option to replace all existing data in the sheet with new data from your input. This will clear any extra rows beyond the updated range.

props.name: check_for_duplicate
props.description: Enable this option to check for duplicate values before inserting data into the sheet. Only unique rows will be added based on the selected column.

props.name: check_for_duplicate_column
props.description: The column to check for duplicate values.

props.name: as_string
props.description: Inserted values that are dates and formulas will be entered as strings and have no effect

props.name: headerRow
props.description: Enter the row number where your column headers are located (usually row 1).

insert_row.description: Add a new row of data to a specific spreadsheet.

props.name: as_string
props.description: Inserted values that are dates and formulas will be entered strings and have no effect

update-multiple-rows.description: Updates multiple rows in a specific spreadsheet.

props.name: values
props.description: The values to update.

props.name: rowId
props.description: The row id to update

props.name: as_string
props.description: Inserted values that are dates and formulas will be entered as strings and have no effect

props.name: headerRow
props.description: Which row contains the headers?

update_row.description: Update the data in an existing row.

props.name: row_id
props.description: The row number to update

google-sheets-new-or-updated-row.description: Triggers when a new row is added or modified in a spreadsheet.

props.name: trigger_column
props.description: Trigger on changes to cells in this column only. \nSelect **Any Column** if you want the flow to trigger on changes to any cell within the row.

googlesheets_new_row_added.description: Triggers when a new row is added to bottom of a spreadsheet.

new-spreadsheet.description: Triggers when a new spreadsheet is created.

new-worksheet.description: Triggers when a worksheet is created in a spreadsheet.
